B

BibliographicProduct - Class in model
The BibliographicProduct class represents a bibliographic product in the virtual library system.

Constructs a BibliographicProduct object with the specified identifier, name, number of pages, publication date, URL, and pages read.

Constructs a Book object with the specified identifier, name, number of pages, publication date, URL, pages read, short review, genre, sale value, and copies sold.
